question:
Your neighbours have recently written to you to complain about the noise from your houselflat.

Write a letter to your neighbours. In your letter:

explain the reasons for the noise
apologise
describe what action you will take
text: I am reaching out to you to apologize for the inconvenience of the noise coming from our house.

I have been living in this neighbourhood for almost ten years and always make effort to be a responsible neighbour. However, we have to maintain our kitchen since all the cabinets have been broken up, and the tiles should be changed. Although  I always remind the workers to keep the noise down, sometimes it is inevitable to work without machines which makes lots of noise.

I am incredibly sorry for all the troubles that happen to you and your family during this time. I would ask workers to cut the woods in their company so the machines sound do not disturb you. Also, they are going to stop working after five so your children can easily concentrate on their homework.
Please let me know if we should take more steps to tackle this issue for you.
